home.welcome.title:
Car service,
made simple
home.welcome.description: Fixing your car can be stressful, and it’s difficult to know if you’re being ripped off. With Autofix you can quickly find a trusted mechanic in your local area, compare prices and reviews, then book a meeting.
home.intro.title: All services, all car brands
home.intro.description: We offer all kinds of services for all car brands and make sure that your car is always in good hands. Book an appointment today!
home.howto.title:
We are here to make 
your car service easy & 
 transparent
home.howto.description:
Enjoy a transparent, easy process with no 
 hidden fees or catches and get affordable 
 car servicing at our nationwide network of 
 independent garages.
home.testimonial.title:
Trusted
by customers
home.tofix.description: If your car is in need of some love, we’re here to help. Just tell us what needs fixing, and we’ll book it into one of our approved workshops. It’s that easy!
home.tofix.title: We’re here to help you fix your car
carSelection.header.title: What kind of car do you drive?
home.signup.title: Get a free booking!
home.signup.description: Subscribe to receive our offers and enjoy 1 booking for free! No spam, we promise.
